attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have lost the sight in one eye and unable to apply for a LGV licence, I would like to get the law changed so that I can drive a bigger lorry, I drive a 7.5 ton lorry every day, what is differance between that and a 10ton lorry, none other than the 10 ton lorry is restricted to 56mph which makes it safer.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
